description: List published marketing pages. Public endpoint (no authentication required). Returns MarketingPageList with pages array and total count. Uses MarketingService.list_pages with include_drafts=False and include_deleted=False. Only returns published pages (drafts and deleted pages excluded). Response structure is validated (pages must be a list, total must be non-negative integer). Individual page conversion errors are logged but don't fail the entire request. Pages are converted to GraphQL types with error handling.
